cs113.calendar.guiview
Class ListArea

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  cs113.calendar.guiview.ListArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ListArea
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This is used to display the results of a search. It displays them in a list. Each item in the list is a button, and you can click on them to edit the appointments.

Author:
Owen Healy
See Also:
Serialized Form
